title: bhuvana patI
sahitya:
bhuvana patI prabhO pANDurangA parama puruSan unai nAn maravEn


anupallavi

  avani vAzhvil nin tiruvaruLinri oru shuvai azhagillaiyE en nAthA


caraNam    mAtA pitA inbam-anaiyALum nI maindar uDal poruLum en deivam nI un
 pAdAmbujat-toNDum nAma bhajanamum piravi tOrum irundAl pOdum sakala
